title: What are some examples of sensor applications? - Quora

response.answer_text: What are some examples of sensor applications? 1. Automatic door, using the infrared microwave of the human body to open and close the door; 2. Smoke alarm, using smoke resistance to measure the smoke concentration so as to achieve the purpose of the alarm; 3. Mobile phones, digital camera cameras, using optical sensors to capture images; 4. Electronic scale, making use of mechanical sensors (conductor strain gauge technology) to measure the pressure of the object corresponding to the variable in order to measuring weight; 5.Water level alarm, temperature alarm, humidity alarm, optical alarm, etc.

Sensors can be used in light switches to automate light control. Sensor switches detect motion to automatically turn lights, fans, or other loads on or off. They are especially useful in areas where the lights are usually forgotten, or in a laundry room, where one usually enters with hands full.
